text:
[Verse]
Daylight's fading quick
Colors in the sky
Running through the fields
Chasing fireflies

[Verse 2]
Feet don't touch the ground
Hearts start to race
In this golden light
We find our place

[Chorus]
Sunsets in our eyes
Endless open skies
Together we will fly
Chasing sunset's high

[Verse 3]
Moments freeze in time
Laughing all the way
Memories we’ll find
In every single day

[Bridge]
Stars begin to peep
Night takes over day
But we keep the spark
In our own way

[Chorus]
Sunsets in our eyes
Endless open skies
Together we will fly
Chasing sunset's high
title: Chasing Sunsets
